title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', and 'd'. These classes prominently appear in the dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes are visible in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should not be visible in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the IDE and go to the Open Type dialog. 
2. Observe that the obfuscated classes are listed in the dialog.
